name: Hunter Diamond
description: Token Hunters is a play-to-earn mobile game working with the AR technology and combining social and game elements. You have to go to the nature or to the city and search for treasures containing NFT and tokens. HUNT is the token that will be use in the game to : • Used for governance and decision-making (DAO) • Benefits and rewards for staking • Part of avatar and item upgrading • Purchase of NFTs in the game There is a total supply of 1,000,000,000 HUNT. This project is the brainchild of 4 co-founders that experience in several sectors (IT, App development, Finance and Marketing. Two of them are childhood friends and 2 others were work colleagues. Knowing each other by sight, they decided to discuss a game project and embarked on the adventure. The project has continued to evolve and now the team has 9 employees.
